title: 4X4 Off-Road Redneck Racing [RIP]
description:
4X4 Off-Road Redneck Racing - Interplay(c)


The Game:
This racer is "a blast of seriously fun off-road racing action."
Select from 16 different vehicles types - each with three styling 
variations making for a grand total of 48 unique racing machines... 
Take on the best drivers in the south across 24 challenging tracks, 
 spread across 6 environments

Redneck Racing features impressive graphics, complete with realistic
weather effects and detailed tracks that rival the most visually
 sophisticated off-road racing game.
